q: The trust includes Barts in the City, the Royal London in Whitechapel and The London Chest hospital in Bethnal Green. In a new interview with ex`` American Idol'' judge Simon Cowell , Oprah Winfrey peels away a few layers from this complicated man she calls the world's most famous talent scout. The interview for her new network show called`` Oprah Winfrey Presents Master Class'' delves into Simon Cowell 's childhood and gives him a chance to reflect on why he has become so successful. and technology thought leadership-all of which are increasingly important given Google's global reach.'' Internally, Eric Schmidt will continue to act as an advisor to Larry and Sergey Brin . In a statement, Eric Schmidt said: We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come. Eric Schmidt has clearly done an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade. The results speak for themselves.
